titles.title: Whom Shall I Fear (God Of Angel Armies)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You hear me when I call
You are my morning song
Though darkness fills the nightIt cannot hide the light
Whom shall I fear

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You crush the enemy
Underneath my feet
You are my sword and shield
Though troubles linger still
Whom shall I fear

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I know who goes before me
I know who stands behind
The God of angel armies
Is always by my side

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The one who reigns forever
He is a friend of mine
The God of angel armies
Is always by my side

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
My strength is in Your name
For You alone can save
You will deliver me
Yours is the victory

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Whom shall I fear
Whom shall I fear

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I know who goes before me
I know who stands behind
The God of angel armies
Is always by my side

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
The one who reigns forever
He is a friend of mine
The God of angel armies
Is always by my side

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
And nothing formed against me shall stand
You hold the whole world in Your hands
I'm holding on to Your promises
You are faithful
You are faithful

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
And nothing formed against me shall stand
You hold the hold world in your hands
I'm hold on to your promises

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
You are faithful
You are faithful
You are faithful

verse.lines:
I know who goes before me
I know who stands behind
The God of angel armies
Is always by my side
